document_data.mainbody:
rospaer on Nameless Horrors was a book on magic.
In the , the sorceress Dasumia commanded her apprentice Elminster Aumar to fetch Prospaer on Nameless Horrors from her side table in a well-warded room, the Blue Chamber, in her own Castle of the Lady, along with the other books the Orbrum and the Tome of Three Locks.
